hackathon.title: TEN Dev Challenge 2025
hackathon.subtitle: Join Developers Worldwide to Build Conversational AI
hackathon.heroTitle: Build the Next Generation of Real-Time Voice AI

about.title: What's This All About?
about.description: The TEN Dev Challenge 2025, hosted by TEN Framework, center on real-time engagement and Conversational AI, inviting developers worldwide to shape the next generation of voice-interaction products.
about.descriptionTwo: From voice companionship to smart homes to enterprise services, we look forward to discovering new voice-driven scenarios. Join us in exploring practical applications for voice agents!

framework.title: TEN Framework
framework.description: An open-source framework for conversational voice AI agents
framework.features: Enables developers to quickly build real-time voice agents (with abilities of vision and others), making it easy for developers to experiment, integrate LLM, STT, TTS and create reusable extensions

challenge.title: Challenge Overview
challenge.description: Participants must build their projects using the open-source TEN Familyï¼ˆTEN Framework/TEN VAD/TEN Turn Detectionï¼‰. You can integrate a wide range of technologies and hardware, such as ASR, LLMs, TTS, SIP, and ESP32 to create innovative voice-interactive applications.
challenge.serviceAgents: Service Agents: Voice-powered customer service, smart eldercare helpers
challenge.iotHardware: IoT & Hardware: Voice-controlled smart home devices
challenge.emotionalCompanions: Emotional Companions: AI live streamers, virtual companions

prizes.title: Prizes & Awards

firstPlace.title: TEN Voice Innovation Award - First Place (1 team)

secondPlace.title: TEN Voice Innovation Award - Second Place (1 team)

thirdPlace.title: TEN Voice Innovation Award - Third Place (2 teams)

prizes.showcase: All winning projects will have the opportunity to be showcased at the RTE Conference.
prizes.ambassador: Winners will also be given priority consideration to become TEN Framework Community Ambassadors, with access to exclusive ambassador benefits.
prizes.eligibilityNote: To be eligible for the "TEN Voice Innovation Awards" (1st, 2nd, and 3rd place prizes), your project must be built primarily on the TEN Framework.
prizes.technicalNote: Projects that only use the TEN VAD or Turn Detection features will only be considered for the "TEN Technical Award".

kiro.title: Kiro Prize
kiro.subscription: Each member of the Top 10 teams will be awarded a complimentary three-month Kiro Pro subscription.
kiro.cash: Top 10 teams that use Kiro during development will receive an exclusive cash prize ($300 per team).

judges.title: Judging Panel
judges.hermes: Hermes, Director of DevRel and Partner Engineering @Agora

timeline.title: Event Timeline
timeline.deadline: Registration & submissions close: Sept 26, 23:59 PDT (Sept 27, 06:59 UTC)
timeline.workshopsDesc: Throughout the submission period, we'll be hosting several online workshops to offer technical support on our official TEN Discord channel.

workshop.title: ðŸ›  Online Workshop: Building Conversational AI with TEN Framework

workshop.desc2: This workshop will show you how to build voice agents step by step using the TEN Framework. Weâ€™ll walk through TENâ€™s core concepts and module layout, configuration, and deploymentâ€”so you can make the most of TEN in the competition!
workshop.desc3: Make sure to join our Discord channelâ€”weâ€™ll be sharing the livestream link there!

participate.title: How to Participate
participate.signUp: Sign Up - Register on lu.ma and join our official Discord channel to stay updated.
participate.build: Build - Create your project using the open-source TEN Framework.
participate.submit: Submit - Send us your project, documentation, and a demo.
participate.features: A breakdown of the features developed using the TEN Framework(TEN VAD/TTD)
participate.demo: A demo video, a link to the live experience, etc.

eligibility.title: Project Eligibility
eligibility.openToAll: Open to all. You can compete as an individual or in a team of up to 3 members.
eligibility.teamFormation: Team Formation. You can form a team beforehand or find teammates on our Discord channel.
eligibility.buildWithTen: Build with TEN. All projects must be built on the TEN Framework.
eligibility.originalWork: Original Work. All submissions must be original work, free of any legal or copyright issues.
eligibility.note: Please click the following link to review the Participant Guidelines. By registering and submitting your project, you acknowledge and agree to follow these official guidelines.

discord.title: Discord Community
discord.description: Join us on the official Discord channel
discord.support: If you have any questions about the competition, you can ask in our official Discord community or send an email to developer@theten.ai.

cta.title: Ready to Build?
cta.description: Join TEN Dev Challenge 2025 and reshape the future of human-AI interaction with real-time voice AI.
